resources.string: CV - Andrii Shypilov
Android(Java, Kotlin), C/C++, SQLite, FireBase, Git

"Previously, I was involved in the promotion of board games. But then I entered the Unit Factory for the course School 42. Now looking for a job as a mobile application developer. Studying different programming languages and directions, I chose mobile development for myself as more interesting.

In the Unit Factory I studied at the rate of School 42, which was developed in France. This program is designed for self-study, without teachers. It develops peer-to-peer among students and the ability to find the necessary information on the Internet. Here I got the basics of programming and knowledge of programming languages C/C++, Java. The training consisted in the execution of projects.
1. Libft - Writing functions to create a library that will be used in future projects.(Programming language - С)\n https://github.com/Ashypilo/libft
2. Filler - Game project in which you need to fill the playing field faster than your opponent.(Programming language - С)\n https://github.com/Ashypilo/filler
3. Lem-in - Project in which you need to find the shortest and most effective way that ants can go.(Programming language - С)\n https://github.com/Ashypilo/Lem-in
4. Corwar - This command project involves creating a virtual arena, and having simplistic-language programs fight each other.(Programming language - С)\n https://github.com/Ashypilo/Corwar
5. Piscine_CPP - Getting the basics of a programming language CPP.\n https://github.com/Ashypilo/Piscine-CPP
6. AbstractVM - Is a machine that uses a stack to compute simple arithmetic expressions. (Programming language - СPP)\n https://github.com/Ashypilo/Abstract_VM
7. Avay-launcher - Implementation of a simple Java program according to a given class diagram written in UML. (Programming language - JAVA)\n https://github.com/Ashypilo/avaj-launcher
8. SWINGY-RPG - 2D RPG game on the framework SWING.(Programming language - JAVA)\n https://github.com/Ashypilo/swingy_rpg
9. Ft_hangouts - Сreating a contact list for calls and email.(Programming language - JAVA(Android)) \n https://github.com/Ashypilo/ft_hangouts
My job is to recognize objects, people, distinctive features on the street or indoors for further training in artificial intelligence.
Here are the projects that I did for myself and during self-study courses
1. Quiz through the Harry Potter universe. (Programming language - Kotlin)
2. My CV as a mobile app. (Programming language - Kotlin)
3. Regular calculator. (Programming language - Kotlin)
4. Game FlappyBird on the framework libGDX. (Programming language - JAVA)
5. Messenger for FireBase(Programming language - JAVA)
6. Taxi call app(Programming language - JAVA)
7. Drawing application(Programming language - Kotlin)
